slides.bottomText: I don't know if delegation fatigue has been linked to LLMs yet...

slides.topText: But you see this a lot in managerial positions.
slides.bottomText: Some managers end up just doing the work themselves

slides.topText: because they're so tired of going through the process of breaking tasks down,
slides.bottomText: having to understand what this subordinate can do, what the strikes and misses are.
